item.description:
Prime Time for the Sun worshippers and beach goers is over, so we can now get back to having daytime meetups on the beaches of the Maine and NH Seacoast.

First stop ..... Fort Foster.

So pack up your pooch, some doggie treats, dress in layers and let's meet at Fort Foster for a nice walk along the water and exploring at the Fort.

Don't forget your pooper bags !!

Game plan is to meet at Fort Foster at 1 pm.

If you want to carpool from Manchester, meet at Hannafords Parking Lot on Bicentennial Drive on the Manchester/Hooksett town line (DW Highway). We'll leave from the Hannafords Parking lot at 11:30 am.





Plunk is looking forward to seeing many of her regular buddies as well as meeting some new ones. So please join us for an afternoon at the shore.

If you have any questions, please email Judi and Plunk

Woof woof

And don't forget to dress in layers. It may be a tad chilly along the water.

We can also find a nice spot for a bite to eat afterwards, if anyone is interested.
item.how_to_find_us: Plunk will be the cute beagle screaming "Over Here.....over here.......over here !!! "

group.name: Human Soles & Doggie Paws Hikers & Walkers of Manchester, NH

item.name: Fort Foster on a Sunday Afternoon
